entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:43 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 10:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
